website_summaries.verdict: A simple diving computer that comes packed with advanced functions for safer diving.
pros: Comes with a nitrox function, allowing you to keep track of three different gas mixtures
Precautionary limits can be set ahead of time to trigger warning alarms and notifications
cons: Dive computer has difficulties and compatibility issues with Mac computers

customer_reviews.title: Very beginner friendly.
customer_reviews.text: This computer is HUGE. This is my first dive computer and I find it to be very simple to use. There are a lot of features. Also able to use with NITROX. Mine came brand new in the box with manual and warranty papers as well as a mares sticker. I recommend this dive computer to all.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Crye

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I believe my model was a refurb. The display can be difficult to navigate through. The large buttons seem "squishy" and don't provide enough tactile response when diving to be useful. I really struggled using this watch on my last dive. It broke up my one dive into three dives. It shut off around 50 ft of depth. The problem is that I really like the price and the giant screen, but I need something more solid and reliable. Returning ASAP and back on the market for a beginner dive watch.
customer_reviews.author: Wouldn'tULik2Know

customer_reviews.title: High quality, excellent visibility. Easy to hear its beeps
customer_reviews.text: Probably you have already researched this if you are reading reviews and considering buying. So I'll concentrate on what's important. The battery lasts multi-years. The speaker is larger and it is easy to hear underwater when it beeps. Numbers/letters are clear, as this is a larger unit. If you keep it illuminated it's still easy to make out when its darker. I've been using this for years and the quality is good. For the price this has been a good, reliable Nitrox computer.
customer_reviews.author: bdomeor

customer_reviews.title: After 9 dives here is the description of the issue ...
customer_reviews.text: After 9 dives here is the description of the issue. 1) During diving, dive computer screen got frozen and now dive computer is not responding to any buttons. 2) I Cannot open battery compartment as it seems to stuck.i was thinking to remove/replace battery. I was trying to use coin to open it as per manual but it didnt work and plastic on the battery dompartment is not strong so you can see that its already deformed by coin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Bang For The Buck
customer_reviews.text: I’ve taken this on over a dozen dives and love it so far. I use reading glasses so I needed something I could see up close. For me it was either this or a Shearwater which is much sharper but also much more expensive. I’m good with this for now.
customer_reviews.author: GenPatton

customer_reviews.title: received quick and as described.
customer_reviews.text: this watch is fantastic, extremely accurate, love that it also captures temps..
customer_reviews.author: jason barker

customer_reviews.title: First scuba watch
customer_reviews.text: Very good watch for beginner, easy use display, the only issue is this product do not come with the transfer cable, they sold separately.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Nemo Wide
customer_reviews.text: Was surprised by the actual size when it arrived. The software that came with it did not work on my computer. I went to their website and downloaded the software and manual there. Easy to set, use, and scroll through the menus. I have only used it once so far and am pleased with its performance. I did not by the download cable, but now wish I had and will shortly. So far I would recommend to a friend or fellow diver.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Goldammer

customer_reviews.title: Not as bright as they make it sound like but yet easy to see
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be of good quality I'll tried out Friday
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a beginner.
customer_reviews.text: The screen is large and easy to navigate under water. I can adjust for Nitrox and the log is clear.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, big screen and light support. For the price, awesome DC.
customer_reviews.text: Could not describe it better than the headline title. It works perfectly flawless. The big screen is very helpful for people with optical problems. Price is above fair for the quality. Totally reccommended.
customer_reviews.author: Paulo

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Just the best computer available! It is extremely easy to use, find info, set...
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great, easy to use and see when at depth, even in low light.... simple navigating through the set up.....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I liked that the numbers are large, it makes it very easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Wide is Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Ok, yes, the thing is massive. But I'm not planning to wear it around as a fashion accessory, so massive is just fine. I like the large display and buttons as I sometimes dive in the cold murky waters of the puget sound with thick gloves: I can actually use this! Battery life is not phenomenonal, but being user replaceable, it's not a biggie. Just add a spare battery to your save-a-dive kit. I also got the USB cable to download dives. Pricy add-on, but was worth it for me study and log my dives.
customer_reviews.author: Lennie

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Star off for the log feature
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Star off for the log feature. Its backwards and doesnt give time or date just a number so that it gets confusing. Greatprice for such a well working scuba equipment
customer_reviews.author: RACH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Haven't got to dive with it yet, other than the pool, but it is as described.
customer_reviews.author: Brian F.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It won't work upon receiving the item. Had to replace battery
customer_reviews.author: Scubarella

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It did not work. It was unprogram the day I got it out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Tim in vero

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Dive Computer
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Nemo Wide I own. It's a great recreational diving computer. The information is clear and reliable (thanks to its RGBM model), the numbers are big enough even for the short-sighted, and its use is very intuitive and easy. You can use it with air, nitrox and as gauge. The battery is user replaceable wich is a plus and the price is affordable for any pocket. In short, it's a great tool for any serious recreational diver.
customer_reviews.author: Herty

customer_reviews.title: They can leak
customer_reviews.text: Had an older one, three years into its life, it flooded at about 60' near Providenciales, Turks and Caicos, but I'm a glutton for punishment. I purchased the newer version, since I really liked the big display. Now to learn this one, slightly different screens.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce H. McKeon

product_meta.title: Mares Nemo Wide Dive Computer Wrist Watch
product_meta.description: The Mares nemo wide 2 diving computer is the second generation of this feature packed wrist diving computer from Mares. The big display of the nemo wide, an air and nitrox dive computer, makes it easy to use and easy to read with clear, big readable digits. This new nemo wide 2 414114 now also incorporates a bottom timer Mode with a stopwatch function. The Mares nemo wide 2 is potentially an absolute must for any scuba diver particularly those divers requiring a little help to read a computer - with its 'oversize' digits and superb clarity of dive information. Superb ergonomic 'wide' screen design. Mares have paid particular attention to the design of computer to optimize readability. The size of the digits, the clarity of the screen and backlighting as well as a 170 degree viewing angle.
feature_bullets: New nitrox function: three-different gas mixtures during single dive
Wide, high-contrast display with a 170 degree Viewing angle, data displayed in large-size characters
4 buttons easy access simple to use, upgradeable software, hypoallergenic rubber strap, algorithm: mares-wince rgbm
Deep stops and safety stop functions, back lighting, user replaceable batteries, mineral glass lens, altitude adjustable, log book function
Air, nitrox and bt function modes, precautionary programmable, 492' depth Rating, power indicators, audible alarms, calendar and temperature displays
